## âš¡ DEPLOYMENT OPTIONS (Pick One)

### Option 1: VERCEL (2 minutes) â­ RECOMMENDED

```bash
npm install -g vercel
vercel --prod --cwd=d:\sam\cal
```

âœ… Fastest deployment  
âœ… Automatic HTTPS  
âœ… Global CDN  
âœ… Free tier available  

**Result**: Your site live at `https://[project].vercel.app`

---

### Option 2: NETLIFY (2 minutes)

```bash
npm install -g netlify-cli
netlify deploy --prod --dir=d:\sam\cal\dist
```

âœ… Easy setup  
âœ… Automatic HTTPS  
âœ… Global CDN  
âœ… Free tier available  

**Result**: Your site live at `https://[project].netlify.app`

---

### Option 3: GITHUB PAGES (3 minutes)

```
1. Create new GitHub repo: "calculatorsolution"
2. Push dist/ folder to repo
3. Settings â†’ Pages â†’ Enable
4. Deploy
```

âœ… Free  
âœ… Version control  
âœ… GitHub integration  

**Result**: Your site live at `https://yourusername.github.io/calculatorsolution`

---

### Option 4: CUSTOM HOSTING (5 minutes)

Upload `dist/` folder via FTP to your hosting provider.

âœ… Full control  
âœ… Custom domain  
âœ… Own branding  

**Cost**: $5-20/month

---

## ðŸŒ ADD CUSTOM DOMAIN (Optional)

1. Buy domain from NameCheap, GoDaddy, or Google Domains ($10-15/year)
2. Point DNS to your hosting:
   - Vercel: Add domain in project settings
   - Netlify: Add domain in site settings
   - GitHub Pages: Add in repository settings
   - Custom: Add A records from hosting provider

3. Enable HTTPS (automatic with Vercel/Netlify)

**Result**: Your site live at `https://yourdomain.com`

---

## ðŸ“ˆ SUBMIT TO GOOGLE (2 minutes)

### Google Search Console

1. Go to: https://search.google.com/search-console
2. Click "Add property"
3. Enter your URL (e.g., `https://yourdomain.com`)
4. Verify ownership (easiest: add DNS record)
5. Go to "Sitemaps" section
6. Add new sitemap: `/sitemap.xml`
7. Submit!

âœ… Google starts crawling your pages  
âœ… Track rankings in Search Console  
âœ… Monitor impressions & clicks
